subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Unicode proposal again.
msgSnippet: ... Shavian is already encoded in Plane 1. From what I have seen so far, some extensions to Shavian may be added in order to support QS. -- Michael Everson *
messageBody:
At 09:06 -0400 2007-05-31, Ph.D. wrote:

>We're talking about assigning QS and Shavian to code points in Plane 1, right?

Shavian is already encoded in Plane 1. From what I have seen so far,
some extensions to Shavian may be added in order to support QS.
--
Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com
